summary.span: 表示可调整的箭头形状的线的末端。

span.span: Represents an adjustable arrow-shaped line cap.
This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 始终填充用此构造函数创建的箭头末端。

span.span: The arrow end caps created with this constructor are always filled.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建对象名为`myArrow`。Creates an object named `myArrow`. - 创建对象名为`capPen`，并设置其和属性等于`myArrow`。Creates a object named `capPen`, and sets its and properties equal to `myArrow`. - 使用方法，以便绘制屏幕受两个箭头的行。Uses the method to draw to screen a line capped by two arrows. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建对象名为`myArrow`。Creates an object named `myArrow`. - 创建对象名为`capPen`，并设置其和属性等于`myArrow`。Creates a object named `capPen`, and sets its and properties equal to `myArrow`. - 使用方法，以便绘制屏幕受两个箭头的行。Uses the method to draw to screen a line capped by two arrows. span.span: This property is if the arrow cap is filled; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Height { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置箭头末端的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the arrow cap.
The height of the arrow cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 箭头线帽的高度缩放的宽度用于绘制带帽的行的对象。The height of the arrow cap is scaled by the width of the object used to draw the line being capped. 例如，如果您正在使用钢笔绘制封闭的行具有 5 像素宽度和对象具有高度为 3，则实际箭头帽绘制为 15 像素高。For example, if you are drawing a capped line with a pen that has a width of 5 pixels, and the object has a height of 3, then the actual arrow cap is drawn 15 pixels high.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float MiddleInset { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置箭头末端的边框和填充之间的单位数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of units between the outline of the arrow cap and the fill.

value.span: 箭头帽的轮廓和箭头帽的填充之间单位的数目。

span.span: The number of units between the outline of the arrow cap and the fill of the arrow cap.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Width { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置箭头末端的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the arrow cap.

value.span: 按单位计的箭头帽的宽度。

span.span: The width, in units, of the arrow cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 箭头帽的宽度进行缩放后的宽度用于绘制带帽的行的对象。The width of the arrow cap is scaled by the width of the object used to draw the line being capped. 例如，如果您正在使用钢笔绘制封闭的行具有 5 像素宽度和对象具有的宽度为 3，则实际箭头线帽大小为宽绘制 15 像素。For example, if you are drawing a capped line with a pen that has a width of 5 pixels, and the object has a width of 3, then the actual arrow cap is drawn 15 pixels wide.
